summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 15287, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ninth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from University Street to Pine Street, by laying therein water mains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 391 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
